<page title>: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 200mm f/2G ED VR II Lenses
focusing: Autofocus with a built-in SWM and manual focus
lens construction: 13 elements in 9 groups (with three ED glass and one Super ED glass elements, and Nano Crystal Coat),as well as 1 protective glass
picture angle: 12°20’ with 35 mm (135) format Nikon film SLR cameras and Nikon FX format digital SLR cameras 8° with Nikon DX format digital SLR cameras
